about_the_game:
In ViRo Live Studio, anyone can stream online as a professional V-Tuber


  • Full-body motion capture with popular affordable VR and motion capture hardware.
  • Support for Oculus, HTC, and Valve VR HMDs and controllers or full body tracking with Steam trackers and full face-tracking with an iPhone and our companion Viro Live Face Portal application
  • native Vroid Studio VRM support, or you can import your custom made characters, no limits!
  • Built on the engine/software behind Vex Ruby, the world's most advanced virtual cam performer.
  • seamless OBS integration.
  • Simulated facial tracking with your VR HMD microphone
  • Optional advanced iPhone face-capture with our companion iOS ViRo Live Face Portal app:


Extensive Features for Advanced Users
  • Powerful console interface - Change environments, models/outfits, props, sound effects, particle effects and more in real-time with our advanced command line interface.
  • Streams can be via iPad or other tablet-based control panels for easy real-time control and triggering during live production using an iPad or tablet.
  • Unlock adult streaming features with the LewdTube DLC
  • Support for our optional low-fatigue face-capture rig for extended live performances.



With hassle free full body tracking and the option to choose full range face tracking through our iOS app or simulated face tracking when using VR with expression controls, you’ll have more time to focus on your stream. The way you perform is completely up to you. Express yourself with just a microphone using simulated lip syncing, or go all out with full body and face tracking in real-time!

You can perform in ViRo Live Studio with:
  • Full Body Tracking with HTC Vive Trackers (x3 Needed)
  • Full Face Tracking with ViRo Live Face Portal for iOS
  • Full Face Tracking with HTC Vive Pro Eye with additional face tracker
  • Full Body Tracking with OptiTrack Motion Capture Devices
  • Full Body Tracking with Noitom Motion Capture Devices
  • Upper body performance with any VR headset
  • Simulated Lip Sync with just a mic





ViRo Live Studio lets you control every aspect of your broadcast, even in VR, such as:
  • Avatar
  • Background
  • Visuals
  • Lighting
  • Camera
  • Color
  • Processing





Menus and controls are hidden from viewers so they only see what you want them to see. This works by sending the output directly to OBS.



ViRo Live Studio also includes a Unity3D Editor Project with tools to help you make your own characters, props, backgrounds, sounds, cameras, ... the list goes on. Export your creation as a Bundle for easy access in ViRo Live Studio



We want you to be able to make your broadcast match your unique vision. ViRo Live Studio has a fully open console command / user asset system so you can create any scenario you dream of. You can also create full 3D scenes, props, animations, and more with our included Unity project.





The app is built on the foundation created for Vex Ruby, the world’s most advanced VR camgirl. It is designed from ground up with professional livestreaming in mind. By performers, for performers.



ViRo Live Studio offers direct integration with adult streaming support (adult toys, tips, chat window, and more) for all you LewdTubers out there. Of course, Adult features are completely optional.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains automation tools and API integration with adult platforms.  The app is designed for adult streamers, adult V-Tubers (LewdTubers), and has direct adult toy integration.

movies.name: ViRo Live Studio - Pro Live V-Tubing for Streamers

name: LewdTube Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 970 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Hardware Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Professional quality motion capture performance tool for Vtubers, and avatar streamers. Hassle-free full range body and face tracking with support for adult performers via DLC, VRoid/VRM model importing, and endless future customization with user generated content.
